title: Roy Tang
description: Roy Tang's blog. Programmer, engineer, scientist, critic, gamer, dreamer, and kid-at-heart. Randomly amazed.

items.content_html: Back in Manila after almost a week out of the country. The Metro Manila rain last night was so bad, it reached across the seas and delayed our flight for almost 3 hours, I guess para daw makiramay kami sa traffic ng Metro Manila. Singapore/Malaysia was fun, although being a tourist is exhausting and hard on the legs. At least I’m not yet working until next Tuesday (in theory)
items.summary: Back in Manila after almost a week out of the country. items.content_html: Aside from looking for a cheap competitive deck (probably red), look for a team. Having a team of players lowers the costs considerably since it gives the team access to a pool of cards, more than just one person can have. Not all team members may be available for all events, so you may be able to just borrow decks from time to time. Even if you don’t contribute much financially to the team, you can still be a solid contributor by providing good playtesting and support.
items.summary: Aside from looking for a cheap competitive deck (probably red), look for a team. Having a team of players lowers the costs considerably since it gives the team access to a pool of cards, more than just one person can have. Not all team members may be available for all events, so you may be able to just borrow decks from time to time. Even if you don’t contribute much financially to the team, you can still be a solid contributor by providing good playtesting and support.

items.content_html: On the way home, the taxi driver kept criticizing the drivers we passed by for their violations. He said he was a transport activist so it annoys him to see so many drivers who are “pasaway”. I had to stop myself from commenting that his passenger seat didn’t have a working seat belt =|

He said he was a transport activist so it annoys him to see so many drivers who are “pasaway”. I had to stop myself from commenting that his passenger seat didn’t have a working seat belt =|
